short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to enhance GitLab and PivotalTracker functionalities.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this extension to make your life simpler while using GitLab and PivotalTracker. Major functionalities are:
1: GitLab - Link merge requests with PivotalTracker.
2: PivotalTracker - Adds members filtering function.
3: PivotalTracker - Adds velocity calculator by vacation time.
4: PivotalTracker - Adds selected story points calculator.
